tags.name: Manage API Tokens
tags.description:
The `tokens` endpoint allows you to securely generate, manage, and revoke API access credentials for your platform.

Common use cases include:
- Creating a new API token with an optional description
- Listing all active (non-revoked) tokens linked to your account
- Updating token metadata (e.g. description)
- Revoking tokens that are no longer needed or may have been compromised

tags.name: User Management
tags.description:
The `user` endpoint allows you to create, view, update, and remove users associated with your platform.

Common use cases include:
- Creating a new user profile linked to your business
- Retrieving a list of all users or fetching a specific user by ID
- Updating user details like name, email, or profile image
- Deleting users that are no longer active or needed

tags.name: Business Management
tags.description:
The `Business Management` endpoint enables your platform to mint stablecoins, manage float balances, and view pending transactions.

Common use cases include:
- Minting LZAR tokens to your platform account with optional notes or referral IDs
- Viewing available token balances (float) for issuing payments
- Allocating gas for user wallets
- Listing pending transactions for review or approval

tags.name: Make Transfers
tags.description:
The `transfers` endpoint allows users to send stablecoins to each other securely and instantly.

Common use cases include:
- Initiating peer-to-peer stablecoin transfers between two users
- Moving tokens between user wallets for internal platform operations
- Triggering programmatic transfers for payouts, settlements, or reimbursements

tags.name: Deposit/Withdrawals
tags.description:
The `deposit/withdrawals` endpoint allows you to manage a user's linked bank account and initiate deposit or withdrawal transactions.

Common use cases include:
- Creating or updating bank account details (account number, holder, bank name, etc.)
- Retrieving stored bank account info for user verification or display
- Deleting a user’s bank account on request
- Creating a deposit or withdrawal transaction linked to the user's bank

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description:
The `transactions` endpoint allows you to retrieve a user's payment history and view individual receipts.

Common use cases include:
- Fetching a user's token balances for internal or admin dashboards
- Listing all transactions made by a specific user
- Viewing detailed information for a specific transaction, including type, method, value, and status

tags.name: Verification
tags.description:
The `verification` endpoint enables Know Your Customer (KYC) flows for your platform.

Common use cases include:
- Creating a document verification session for a user
- Uploading ID documents or selfies for verification
- Checking the real-time status of a verification session
- Submitting a session for processing by a verification vendor

tags.name: Charges
tags.description:
The Charges endpoint lets you create a payment request that others can pay.

Common use cases include:
- Businesses creating payment links for customer transactions
- Individuals receiving peer-to-peer payments using a shareable link
- Tracking the real-time status of a payment

tags.name: Staff
tags.description:
The `staff` endpoint allows you to assign users to a business as staff members.

Common use cases include:
- Tipping: Create one-off payments to staff members
- Payroll: Create batch payments for monthly salaries
- HR: Assign and manage staff within an organization

tags.name: Coupons
tags.description:
The `coupons` endpoint allows businesses to issue and manage promotional discounts.

Common use cases include:
- Creating discount codes that vendors can share with customers
- Tracking coupon usage (e.g. claimed vs unclaimed)
- Setting up and funding a pool to cover coupon redemptions
